body.name: Too Late: Definitive Edition
body.description: A psychological suspense novel of obsession and dangerous love. The new, updated edition of Too Late from the number one New York Times best-selling author of Verity.Sloan will go through hell and back for those she loves. And she does so, every single day. Caught up with the alluring Asa Jackson, a notorious drug trafficker, Sloan has finally found a lifeline to cling to, even if it’s meant compromising her morals. She was in dire straits trying to pay for her brother’s care until she met Asa. But as Sloan became emotionally and economically reliant on him, he in turn developed a disturbing obsession with her—one that becomes increasingly dangerous every day.When undercover DEA Agent Carter enters the picture, Sloan’s surprised to feel an immediate attraction between them, despite knowing that if Asa finds out, he will kill him. And Asa has always been a step ahead of everyone in his life, including Sloan. No one has ever gotten in his way.No one except Carter.Together, Sloan and Carter must find a way out before it’s too late.... Read more

productInformation.name: Narrator
productInformation.value: Ryan Gray, Maxine Mitchell, Joe Arden

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite Colleen Hoover book.
reviews.reviewText: This book is so good.It really drew me in and was just amazing. I 10210 recommend. Just be warned, this isn’t a young adult book, and she expressed her trigger warnings at the very beginning. I won’t share more because I don’t want to spoil anything. Just read it. It’s one of my favorite books of hers by far. 😊👍🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My jaw dropped multiple times throughout this book. I thought I knew the direction she was going to take and was completely caught off guard! I’m still personally unsure if I love Colleen as a thriller author because I can’t get into the romance at all I’ve tried to push myself but I just vomit in my mouth a little at the gushy parts but I think she brings it together well for me most of the time! I definitely loved Verity more than this one but was still a jaw dropping, gripping read! ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good read!
reviews.reviewText: I couldn’t put it down. It was dark and haunting. I found myself reading as fast as possible during parts just to see what was going to happen. My heart raced many times as I feared Carter and Sloan being caught by Asa. It really was a good book. I love how suspense novels make you read faster during climactic scenes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars roller coaster of a book
reviews.reviewText: Like most CH books, you’re either into or you can hardly read it. This book definitely kept me interested. It is a roller coaster of a suspenseful book, that is told through several characters perspectives. I feel like the characters were great, but wish that Luke had been a little bit stronger in his roll, and didn’t act so much and so quickly on his emotion.This book is fully about abusive relationships between family members and couples, mixed in with some drugs and alcohol and a college like lifestyle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gripping, emotional, and amazing
reviews.reviewText: Coho does it again! I knew I would love this book because it was by Colleen, but I never imagined it would be something I couldn't stop once I started it. My heart went through all the emotions with Sloan and Luke throughout the whole book. I've never been able to actually feel scared while I read a book but I did in this one. And coho did not disappoint! Great book!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This book may be a trigger to any person who has endured domestic violence. A very well written book covered every aspect of a obsessed abusive relationship. The mental, emotional, physical and sexual pain a person can endure and come out on the other side. A must read for anyone studying psychology, and wanting to have a glimpse of what a person may be going through. This will give you an idea of how much of a chameleon an abuser can be to those they say they love compared to everyone else on the outside looking in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything I didn't know I needed
reviews.reviewText: CONTAINS SPOILERS:Okay, WOW! My fight or flight senses were on high alert, basically the entire book. I wanted SO BAD for Carter and Sloan to work; however, I am thrilled Luke and Sloan have a happy little family now 😉😊Recommend to everyone who likes spicy suspense thrillers! Trigger warnings for foul language, graphic sexual scenes, murder, sexual assault, and drug use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This book was very hard to get into. I knew it was the book we were discussing at our next book club so I kept going. When it started to get good I couldn’t put it down ! Only giving 4 stars for how long it took for me to get into it
I absolutely LOVED this book. I couldn’t read the pages fast enough… any book that can grip my attention like this one did deserves 6 stars… Need more like this !!!

Fiquei surpresa!!! Não esperava gostar tanto desse livro!!! É pesadíssimo e difícil de ler, mas é muito bem escrito e os abusos são retratados de maneira cirúrgica!! Ao contrário de muitos outros livros da Colleen, aqui as problemáticas são retratadas, mas não são romantizadas! O vilão em nenhum momento gera sentimentos de empatia no leitor! E eu agradeço muito a autora por ter feito essa retratação da maneira correta!! Um excelente livro!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Loved this book quick easy read which keeps you hooked from the beginning..love cooleen hoover books all her books are addictive
L'auteure a une écriture très fluide, très bonne lecture.
Top Qualität, sieht aus wie neu!
